items.sentence: I suspect that Tom and Mary are skeptical about that.
I suspect that Tom and Mary are scared of each other.
Tom got jealous when saw Mary talking to another boy.
Good academic performance is the result of diligence.
That's not the main reason that Tom ought to do that.
If you don't stop crying, you'll have me crying, too.
Tom came for the sole purpose of getting information.
The doctor told Tom not to eat solids for a few days.
The next meeting will be held at Tom's new residence.
Tom gives me the same thing for Christmas every year.
